feed.title: Radarr Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Radarr: 5.19.3.9730
entry.content:
To receive further Pre-Release or final updates for a non-docker installation, please change the branch to master. (Settings -> General (Show Advanced Settings) -> Updates -> Branch)

If you are using docker you will need to update the container image. Do not attempt to update Radarr within an existing docker container.

Changes:

  • 36c66deb4b345880e64949132227d8483fc71e7c Recommend against using uTorrent
  • edec432244933a2143c5d13c71de7eb210434e7b Multiple Translations updated by Weblate
  • 554e15d438512e50e7fc22bd68d45d7b4610fb7f New: Watch list sorting and rate limit for Trakt Import Lists
  • 553645a07c4f70b45b0b0f5533f1feab2b719d42 Bump version to 5.19.2
  • 7de7e83c5bd136bf5fdbf78746e734f07969ab81 New: Add Blu-ray link to movie details
  • b7a46bedb036f6e57a2f2d043ddcbd1659fea82d Fixed: Avoid checking for free space if other specifications fail first
  • 0925769377e79dca436de2763d2f902b6e90f0c4 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate
  • 72244362feedf632d2173339177908aaa2cb65d8 Automated API Docs update
  • c6526c34e97e40bf3a5ccaa62f0db6649c6b89e0 Cleanse console log messages
  • efa2913dbc72fc1baadd534c1eabdf479958d117 Translate Trakt popular list types
See More * 35c22a4ffa15f62f18661a70cd2ea172669ba3b4 Fixed: Only show Additional Parameters on Trakt Popular list * 66d96e21dab2ec6824e8fe2654ceadb9a64bec10 Fixed: Fallback to Instance Name for Discord notifications * 36d4e9e6cdcf2de58270dd1d8db174ed492af609 New: Movie Requested filter for interactive search * 7189d7b15c0dec923310cbf5329ac705af5e5b1f Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * 6e80113987bb981902d22ed187c9bece66d7b60a Automated API Docs update * bb8a0dda631cd1b084b7cb165457a6224608935e Fixed: Processing existing movie files via Manage Files * 525ed6568797ce8eb9821957c67b1d90eb8a6a7e Fix download links for FileList when passkey contains spaces * 3fbccc6af3369db96efc95b9399ed22885c7ddde Bump version to 5.19.2 * 8e10eecface61ce227864b2bb507748a73274300 Fixed: Close Metadata settings modal on saving * a3b1512552a8a5bc0c0d399d961ccbf0dba97749 Fixed: Parsing some titles with FRE as French and ITA as Italian * d375b5ffbe03f6939372f59b4e69ae9dcf5c5940 Fixed: Parse GER/DE releases as German language * 884abc03688044d021e5a5a6cefc78bf16695b82 Bump version to 5.19.1 * f8da7aae033d8f94229c38d9d354ddcee60c7cea Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * c165118d4d38b1543a75a8f8e72e87340a289d24 Update README.md * b3dd571a926576678c397a7e87937b714ae2c257 New: Migrated StevenLu URL to new URL * dd900eb7395144b6d299f10fe9475d49d194664e Building docs on ARM * 66aae0c91cd5ac6614c6b54c8e4f9137404025b8 Fixed: Reject multi-part files with P1, P2, etc. * d888a0a2b3bac62f6511f54824d69658de69bfd8 Automated API Docs update * cb5416a18ca8145ccac10c1be20ffb7875e513b7 Improve message for unknown movie rejection in release searching * 7977e0be05a3ea85e7b55d0647a7aad96d3daa74 Add reason enum to decision engine rejections * cd836fef38d58765044c91958096489819bb3c4c Bump version to 5.19.0 This list of changes was [auto generated](https://dev.azure.com/Radarr/961c82cf-1428-4ab0-9257-63be1671eac8/_release?releaseId=157&_a=release-summary).

entry.title: New release for Radarr: 5.20.2.9777
entry.content:
To receive further Pre-Release or final updates for a non-docker installation, please change the branch to master. (Settings -> General (Show Advanced Settings) -> Updates -> Branch)

If you are using docker you will need to update the container image. Do not attempt to update Radarr within an existing docker container.

Changes:

  • 954a040d6e4738d0c24795021936a6e874ed1e86 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate

  • 93581e4a2fc5e3397e3150de8233c26d7330a185 Fixed: Spinning icon on toggling movie monitoring

entry.title: New release for Radarr: 5.21.1.9799
entry.content:
To receive further Pre-Release or final updates for a non-docker installation, please change the branch to master. (Settings -> General (Show Advanced Settings) -> Updates -> Branch)

If you are using docker you will need to update the container image. Do not attempt to update Radarr within an existing docker container.

Changes:

  • 886db23c58f13e63537c99d0173c2bbfdd7af253 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate

  • df4a69ac02725838c9c5a2b2403a0fdca8eb4c38 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate

  • 05935680651664625f219b59b9e51a131e5c33d6 Fixed: Close modal when deleting movie from index [ #10937 ]

entry.title: New release for Radarr: 5.22.4.9896
entry.content:
To receive further Pre-Release or final updates for a non-docker installation, please change the branch to master. (Settings -> General (Show Advanced Settings) -> Updates -> Branch)

If you are using docker you will need to update the container image. Do not attempt to update Radarr within an existing docker container.

Changes:

  • 981a3c2db392099394c4c0b7c182b190877ae3f1 Fixed: Selecting No Change for quality profile inputs

3aa93e79461b694ffb4a4139b526645e0942a946 Fixed: Improve error message for queue items from Transmission * bc08b0b2e1382abaa458c998a7ddeea104c92dc3 Fixed: Avoid requests without categories for FileList * 107f84330382e9d371bf43410b5a148cf9c9a277 New: Add Urdu Language (#10957) * 16b6997b142156df607ea47a02b432f76804bb26 Fixed: Deprecate Media Browser / Legacy Emby metadata * fetching movies twice on initial load * 6e68a919223c8580a87440b73f2279144461621e Fixed: Avoid stale movie statistics on movies index * a962de776b21095a98463421d120bed7e02a34cb Movie updates already done in MovieControllerWithSignalR * e8afde2e90353515b48b2468d3f8e8d1b472fa92 Add XML declaration and clean up Kodi metadata generation * 4633a834f3219d35ceb2bd723009dfb412687898 Save Publish Dates as UTC for grabbed movies * cd021961f0e905563314f09fb69610772cbe5b96 Fixed: Deleting movie folder fails when files/folders aren't instantly removed * 456ea3d57cfc78539fd98596e89a5827c932c08f Fixed: Manual importing queued items with movieId to avoid title parsing [ #10931 ] * d09fa6f880801867f19f6af99b41f3d916961938 Cleanup unused sorting fields for bulk manage providers * bcd4fe1f08cb5af347700a70d087aaeb84ff4d77 Fixed: Priority validation for indexers and download clients * 8efce689226282d6f80126c63571b17ed6f1e333 Fixed: Trakt yearly lists no longer supported * 4b3c29ed9399157fcd6a966dcd86db2306dabffb Fixed: Allow tables to scroll on tablets in portrait mode * 7ea9161779637b1fb7d35786e5dd19cb48249a64 Bump browserslist-db * d4bb318253423b8a19602475a745a6be1128d72e Fixed: Prevent exception for seed configuration provider with invalid indexer ID * 64e865f29675dd89b4372b0942c1555e6b837b3a Enhance failed download warning for items not grabbed by Radarr * 982f9062bd1a1c7fce7ccf946453f6723a01fc0e Fixed: Downloads failed for file contents will be removed from client * 48075e33acc89c3989267ecefad6cd85e4f7d023 New: Option to treat downloads with non-media extensions as failed * 91f08a83cd9fa27c88df423792cdbb0fa655c1fa Bump version to 5.22.0 This list of changes was [auto generated](https://dev.azure.com/Radarr/961c82cf-1428-4ab0-9257-63be1671eac8/_release?releaseId=168&_a=release-summary).

entry.title: New release for Radarr: 5.23.3.9987
entry.content:
To receive further Pre-Release or final updates for a non-docker installation, please change the branch to master. (Settings -> General (Show Advanced Settings) -> Updates -> Branch)

If you are using docker you will need to update the container image. Do not attempt to update Radarr within an existing docker container.

Changes:

  • e0b93a03fdc699185120785cb77e2fc94efc1fb9 Remove create_test_cases.py
  • f7f5837d49d320deec7c44543030336bf7caa9b4 Convert Missing to TypeScript
  • c3ee8b3c906b2234eb3c63ae9b56001b0af3a475 Convert Cutoff Unmet to TypeScript
  • 4de78e3bab50d3d87d35ea34a747d1d3bcc1bb55 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate
  • 426538c8af826dde49cada2dcba6b15aed75d424 Remove console statement
  • c82404c75b9d6ee9c1bf4351daec9342a0bb07e7 Fixed: Loading suggestions for header search input
  • 9bee9841c1dd6974a4a8ccb9324f0a31af3d06fd Fixed: (PTP) Download torrent files with API credentials
  • 010959d915aad3903d0ac6253fbf783b50d98c7d Bump @babel/runtime
  • a6007289169e64b6bf4d29ed6087cdbd6e3c4058 Bump react-virtualized to 9.22.6
  • bbfb8c7cc2e7d48633120ffcce0f2d59f587f373 Bump babel, fontawesome icons, fuse.js, react-lazyload, react-use-measure and react-window

a5e5a63e452394f5fd74aba100077f2b6d33a5c5 Fixed: Upgrade notification title for Apprise * 31b44d2c2e6dd5ee48897b0c1ad896cfb6908fde New: Include movie poster for Apprise *
